text: Amazing food ! This cook belongs in a 5 diamond restaurant ! It's authentic and also Americanized . Highly recommended  the hummus , chicken shawirma, and even the falafel

After months of looking around for some place close by and AUTHENTICALLY GREEK .  We stumbled upon Neko's Gyros  ( it's Ed's Grill & Gyros now ) . We were in a hurry so I ordered the Gyro combo. The lady in the kitchen was very fast and  It was VERY tasty and not at all greasy as some other Gyro places can be.   I will definitely be back to try the rest of the menu.
Had the beef gyro and was very pleased that meat wasn't super greasy. The taziki sauce is on point. All around solid meal!
